name: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite Preview (02-05)
description: Preview snapshot (February 5, 2025) of Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite. Most cost-efficient 2.0 model optimized for speed and scale with multimodal capabilities.
notes: Preview model released February 5, 2025. Available in Google AI Studio and Vertex AI. Outperforms 1.5 Flash on majority of benchmarks. Half the price of GPT-4o mini. Ideal for generating captions at scale or other high-volume tasks.
